title: Damage Mitigation feedback statistic
body:
Hi all.

I have been wanting a statistic to be shown for quite a while in the game summary. ADCs, Mages and Assassins get good feedback from damage done and KDA and creep score etc. A Healer gets feedback from healing done. Obviously damage taken is shown for Tanks. but for some support characters with shields (Ori) or heavy MR/armour (Galio/Rammus) it would be nice to be able to get a Damage Mitigated statistic.

[tl;dr] It would be nice to see a combined statistic of how much damage prevention you did for your team.

What are your thoughts?

Thanks for your time
Khulu

replies.body: Yeah this would be great.  Can't help but feel it would have been raised years ago.  Not sure on why it's still a no but there will be a thread somewhere for whoever is willing to search!
As a Janna main.... YES PLEASE

It seems to me that without this statistic, us supports really miss a huge self development opportunity (because we have no record of how well we're playing in this area!). As a Janna or Braum I'm consistently eager to see how much damage I mitigated/shielded for my peeps in the post game stats. This would be really helpful!
